field.name: mode
field.label: Display Mode
field.description: Select the mode this module should display.

field.name: menu_cb
field.label: CB Menu
field.description: Show or hide display of Community Builder menu.

field.name: menu_cbsubs
field.label: CBSubs Menu
field.description: Show or hide display of Community Builder Subscriptions plugin menu.

field.name: menu_cbgj
field.label: CB GroupJive Menu
field.description: Show or hide display of Community Builder GroupJive plugin menu.

field.name: menu_plugins
field.label: Plugin Menus
field.description: Show or hide display of plugin menus. Please note this will load all published Community Builder plugins to the backend. Plugins with Fatal errors could cause negative affects!

field.name: feed_entries
field.label: Maximum Entries
field.description: Set the maximum number of feed entries to display. Leave empty for no limit.

field.name: feed_duration
field.label: Cache Duration
field.description: Set the duration in hours to cache RSS feeds. Leave empty for no cache.

field.name: modal_display
field.label: Display
field.description: Enable or disable modal display of news feed details when possible.

field.name: modal_width
field.label: Width
field.description: Set the width of the modal window.

field.name: modal_height
field.label: Height
field.description: Set the height of the modal window.
